subject: Design
title: The Fire Extinguisher: Red for a Reason
description: One-minute skill: The Fire Extinguisher: Red for a Reason.

hook.text: Fire extinguishers are bright red, wall-mounted, and labeled with icons. Every choice is a design decision about panic.

buildup.text: In an emergency, people don't read. They scan for color. Red means danger â€” and solution.

discovery.text: The pin-squeeze-sweep operation is designed for fine motor skills degraded by adrenaline.

twist.text: Most people have never used one. Fire extinguisher design must teach itself in the moment of use.

climax.text: Emergency product design must work perfectly for first-time, frightened users. There's no second chance.

punchline.text: The most life-saving designs are the ones you pray you never need to use.

quiz.question: Why are fire extinguishers bright red?
options: Highly visible when scanning in a panic
